TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FragmentNavigationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: 为 FragmentNavigation 事件提供数据。

remarks.format:
## Remarks T 这些事件参数包含有关要导航到的内容片段的信息, 并传递给**FragmentNavigation**事件的处理程序, 该事件由以下项实现:
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>
默认情况下, 内容片段是一个名<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为的内容, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>其属性已设置为, 例如:
``` <TextBlock Name="FragmentName">...</TextBlock> ```
您可以通过[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]具有以下格式的后缀, 导航到片段:
\#*FragmentName*
下面显示了一个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]引用内容片段的示例:
[http://www.microsoft.com/targetpage.xaml#FragmentName](http://www.www.com/homepage.xaml)
可以处理**FragmentNavigation**事件, 并使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs>来实现自定义内容片段处理实现。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Fragment As String
public: property System::String ^ Fragment { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.value: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 片段。 如果将该属性设置为空字符串，将默认导航到内容的顶部。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Handled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取或设置指示是否已对片段导航进行了处理的值。
Docs.value: 如果已对导航进行了处理，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A>设置为`false`, 则系统将尝试查找具有片段名称的元素, 并将其置于视图中。
处理**FragmentNavigation**事件并使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs>实现自定义内容片段处理实现时, 需要`true`将<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A>设置为以重写默认行为。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Navigator As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Navigator { System::Object ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 引发 事件的导航器。
Docs.value: 一个 ，表示正在导航到内容片段的导航器（[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]、 或 ）。
